resources.string: Never match
Does not match any posts. You can use this Condition to disable a particular Rule.
If post title contains
Matches posts with a title containing the text you provide.
If post title contains a word from
Matches posts with a title that contains one or more of the words you provide. \n\nComma-separate the words (eg. one,two,three).
If post text contains
Matches posts with main text containing the text you provide.
If post text contains a word from
Matches posts with main text that contains one or more of the words you provide. \n\nComma-separate the words (eg. one,two,three).
If post text contains a link to
Matches posts with main text that a link to the URL you provide.
If post text contains a link from domains
Matches posts with main text that contains a link to one of the domains that you provide. \n\nComma-separate the domains (eg. google.com,yahoo.com,bing.com).
If post is exact link
Matches posts that are a link to the exact URL you provide.
If post links to a domain from
Matches posts that link to one of the domains you provide. \n\nComma-separate the domains (eg. google.com,yahoo.com,bing.com).
If any comment on the post contains
Matches posts that have a comment containing the text you provide.
If any comment contains a word from
Matches posts that have a comment containing one or more of the words you provide. \n\nComma-separate the words (eg. one,two,three).
If no comments contain any of the words from
Matches posts provided no comments contain any of the words you provide. \n\nComma-separate the words (eg. one,two,three).
If no comment on the post contains
Matches posts that have no comments containing the text you provide.
If any comment contains a link to
Matches posts that have a comment containing the link you provide.
If any comment contains a link to domains
Matches posts with a comment that contains a link to one of the domains that you provide. \n\nComma-separate the domains (eg. google.com,yahoo.com,bing.com).
If no comment contains a link to
Matches posts that have no comments containing the link you provide.
If no comment contains a link to domains
Matches posts with no comments that contains a link to one of the domains that you provide. \n\nComma-separate the domains (eg. google.com,yahoo.com,bing.com).
